command.description: The command to execute as an array of shell arguments.

workdir.description: The working directory to execute the command in.

timeout_ms.description: The timeout for the command in milliseconds.

with_escalated_permissions.description: Whether to request escalated permissions. Set to true if command needs to be run without sandbox restrictions.

justification.description: Only set if with_escalated_permissions is true. 1-sentence explanation of why we want to run this command.
